ae209dd5-7b00-487b-8934-f7ee3a04ab2e.description: Molson Coors Leadership Development Program (MCLDP) focuses on the skillsets & tools to empower mindset of an effective leader. Leaders will learn through interactive activities and shared practices. At the end of this session, leaders will have insights on how to apply the skills and tools learned.
ae209dd5-7b00-487b-8934-f7ee3a04ab2e.name: Molson Coors Leadership Development Program

issuer.summary: issued by Molson Coors Beverage Company

badge_template_activities.title: All leaders at Molson Coors attend MCLDP. The course agenda includes: SLII (A.K.A Situational Leadership), IDEAS – Inclusion, Diversity, Empathy, Attributes, Coaching, Leading Performance and Talent Management in a High-Performance Culture

Living Leadership Completion is a prerequisite. Living Leadership challenges leaders at Molson Coors to be authentic and build a strong growth mindset which will enable leaders to realize our ambition to be first choice.

Living Leadership Session 1: Put People First Value Training including: Molson Coors Values, Emergenetics, Arc of Distortion, Masks Activity, Interference, MindTalk, Patterns of MindTalk, Growth vs Fixed Mindset, Cup Stacking Activity, Growth Mindset Activity, Value Card Activity, Calues in Conflict Activity.
Living Leadership Session 1.5: Put People First Value Training River of Life.

Living Leadership Session 2: Be Bold & Decisive Value Training: GRIT Angela Duckworth Video & Discussion, Risk Taking Lineup Activity. Take Accountability Value Training including: Fail Forward, Learning the Hard Way, Supporting Through Failure, Culture & Performance Management. Learn Everyday Value Training including: GIFT (Giving and receiving feedback) Activity, Active Listening (Story Telling) Activity, SBI Feedback Model & Activity, Motivational States / Boxes, Appreciation, Language.

MCLDP Session 1-2: Situational Leadership II® by Ken Blanchard Companies. SLII® is an adaptive leadership style. This strategy encourages leaders to take stock of their team members, weigh the many variables in their workplace and choose the leadership style that best fits their goals and circumstances.

MCLDP Session 3: IDEAs (Inclusion, Diversity, Empathy, and Attributes) Leadership Training connects the Molson Coors DEI strategy to culture, explores dimensions of diversity and how it shapes identity and biases, identifies diverse customer/consumer patterns and the impact to business, links leadership roles and influence to the employee life cycle, discusses the privilege of leadership, and maximizes tools to model inclusive behaviors.
MCLDP Session 4-5: Bringing it All Together includes Developmental Relationships, GWO Model, Coaching Skills & Practice, Employee Life Cycle, Performance Management, & Talent Management

skills.name: Leading Performance and Talent Management in a High-Performance Culture

5e32e0cd-67ba-450c-9470-1134fb6defe5.description: The Emerging Leaders program intends to accelerate foundational leadership development for high potential employees who are new or aspiring leaders. This program is aligned to our values and the expected behaviors for effective leaders at Molson Coors. The objective is to build a foundation of knowledge and tools to lead teams in a high-performance culture.
5e32e0cd-67ba-450c-9470-1134fb6defe5.name: Emerging Leaders

issuer.summary: issued by Molson Coors Beverage Company

badge_template_activities.title: Emerging Leaders will learn about the 7 Habits of Highly Effective People and Change. They will have an opportunity to connect these habits and change management principles to our effective leadership behaviors. Topics explored include self-awareness, authenticity, grit, situational leadership, continuous improvement, coaching, and empathy. At the end of the program, they will complete a Learning in Action Plan laying out their commitments following the program.

Participants will complete self-paced weekly assignments and come together for cohort connect session in between learning sessions. They will also have an opportunity to meet with their assigned accountability partners. Emerging Leaders will learn topics such as time management, holding others accountable, change, delegating, managing difficult conversations, well-being and more through both self-paced learning and group exercises/discussions.

dd0babe7-6896-4d51-86c2-1e35ead5f01f.description: The Potential, Agility, Capability, Effectiveness (PACE) program enables our efforts to build diverse talent and create inclusion aligned to Molson Coors Beverage Company (MCBC) Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion strategy. It is designed to develop women at MCBC who have the potential and aspirations to be a people leader. Development is ignited through cross-functional collaboration, action learning projects and exposing participants to leadership practices.
dd0babe7-6896-4d51-86c2-1e35ead5f01f.name: PACE - Potential, Agility, Capability, Effectiveness

issuer.summary: issued by Molson Coors Beverage Company

badge_template_activities.title: Action Learning Project: •Engage supporters through compelling storytelling/ communications •Establish strategic networks and leverage them in their career •Learning other functions of the business via cross functional project teams •Understanding and implementing a project charter
Complete a 360 assessment and identify their ‘TAP’ (Talent, passions, and aspirations) to inform their career path and future development.
Session 1: Leadership Tools (12.5 hours): Growth Mindset Emergenetics, IDEAS (DEI training session), Feedback Tools
Session 2: Collaboration and Project Management (12.5 hours): High Performance Teams, Emergenetics - Building Trust
Session 3: Personal Skill Building (16 hours): Visual Story Selling: Presentation skills
Session 4: Career Insights (12.5 hours): Career Development Program: Complete 360 / Career Aspirations
Session 5: Action Learning Project (16 hours): Final Project Presentation

d82967a3-868b-4005-8d64-35ba11f5a97d.description: Individuals who have completed the Molson Coors Process Lead Development Program have participated in a 5-week blended, interactive program covering topics pertinent to their role in a manufacturing environment as well as core leadership fundamentals. Process Leads who have earned this badge have demonstrated strong performance in key skill areas and developed impactful leadership capability as critical frontline leaders.
d82967a3-868b-4005-8d64-35ba11f5a97d.name: Process Lead Development Program

issuer.summary: issued by Molson Coors Beverage Company

badge_template_activities.title: Block 1 (3 weeks of virtual, distance learning): Various skill-building topics, culture, goals and leadership fundamentals
Live week of production equipment optimization learning
Block 2 (1 week of skill application sharing): participants present back their learnings from Block 1 and receive feedback from peers and subject matter experts.

Participants work in teams to select a project that is tied to improving a critical business need. With the support of an executive sponsor and coach, teams work together to develop an actionable plan to decrease or eliminate a production challenge. The teams then present to a panel of leaders a summary of the project, an explanation of the plan and actions taken, the results, and any important learnings and takeaways they were able to implement.

935a291a-8953-4e04-bbd8-ea58e782f26e.description: LEAD is a Molson Coors Beverage Company (MCBC) leadership development program intended to accelerate the readiness of future VP talent. This program will expand on the learnings from other internal leadership programs by providing focus on self, executive presence, public speaking, labor relations, inclusive leadership, enterprise business acumen as well as other topics to prepare the participates to lead at the next level.
935a291a-8953-4e04-bbd8-ea58e782f26e.name: LEAD (Learning Executive Agility Demonstration)

issuer.summary: issued by Molson Coors Beverage Company

badge_template_activities.title: Participants have an opportunity to build their own development journey on topics relevant to their development plans. These topics include: labor relations, executive presence, design thinking, inclusive leadership, and influencing with impact * Self study modules used for teach backs allow participants to learn by doing on topics such as team dynamics, effective delegation, running effective meetings, wellness to promote effective leadership

Learning more about self and opportunities of focus are discovered through 1:1 coaching and reverse mentoring * Participants participate in Toastmasters to practice public speaking and influencing skills * The program final learning brings the learnings from the session to life through a business simulation exercise

22e3535a-a1ba-4b97-a233-01484cddc32c.description: TAP2LEAD is a leadership development program focused on growing diverse talent at Molson Coors aligned to the DEI strategy. The aim is to help participants focus on a SMART goal to unlock their potential so they can thrive in the job they have and realize new and exciting possibilities for the future. Participants gain visibility into their aspirations, connect with our core values, access tools to support their development, and identify growth opportunities.
22e3535a-a1ba-4b97-a233-01484cddc32c.name: TAP2LEAD

issuer.summary: issued by Molson Coors Beverage Company

badge_template_activities.title: TAP2LEAD encourages a growth mindset. Focusing on their talents, aspirations, and passions, participants will create a clear, personal development goal to enable them to be a First Choice employee. This program will help participants: • Strengthen self-awareness and authenticity • Write SMART goals • Make internal network connections • Engage in active listening, feedback, and effective one-on-one conversations • Recognize the power of influence, presence and storytelling

• Participants will be paired with an internal mentor. The mentoring relationship will have both traditional and reverse mentoring opportunities. • Participants will become members of Toastmasters International during the program and will work toward completing a Pathway. • A Capstone Presentation will be required connecting knowledge from the program to their PDP goal.

9e430408-8b3c-4367-89b2-8bec24ba1995.description: The SLP program focuses on growing talent for the commercial organizations across the U.S., Canada and Latin America. Participants will gain an understanding of the differences and similarities of our 3 business units, as well as gain exposure to our most senior leaders through happy hours and a mentorship program. The curriculum will focus on advancing competencies in Leadership, Solutions Selling, Influence & Negotiations, Financial Management and Understanding of Supply Chain.
9e430408-8b3c-4367-89b2-8bec24ba1995.name: SLP - Sales Leadership Program

issuer.summary: issued by Molson Coors Beverage Company

badge_template_activities.title: Participants will complete the 3-day “Strategy of Leadership” program at Kellogg School of Management
Participants will be assigned a real business issue and be required to develop an innovative solution to be presented to Senior Commercial Leaders for implementation, at graduation.
Participants will spend 1 week in each Business Unit—U.S., Canada and LATAM.
